sentences.en: After their frothy first films together, Lee patch , beginning with the sober domestic drama Ice Storm.
sentences.cn: 首次电影合作后, 李安首先是清醒的家庭影片“冰风暴”.

sentences.en: Beat egg whites until frothy, add salt, lemon juice and extracts.
sentences.cn: 把蛋白打至粗泡, 加入食盐, 柠檬汁和香精.

sentences.en: Beat the eggs up to a frothy consistency.
sentences.cn: 把鸡蛋打成黏稠泡沫状。

sentences.en: She was back on her feet before Charlie returned with the two frothy white bouquets.
sentences.cn: 查理拿着两把饱满的花束回到房间前,她已经站起身了.

sentences.en: Sprinkle yeast over the water and let stand until dissolved and frothy.
sentences.cn: 撒上酵母越水,让站着,直到解散和泡沫.

sentences.en: The chromosphere is a frothy layer churned up by gases in the photosphere.
sentences.cn: 色球层在光球层气体的搅拌下是个多泡层.

sentences.en: The frothy sweat of a horse or other equine animal.
sentences.cn: 汗珠马或马类的泡沫状汗水.

sentences.en: The new invention ensures the beer keeps a full, frothy head.
sentences.cn: 这项新发明能保证啤酒始终保持丰富的泡沫。

sentences.en: The sugar must be well melted and the mixture frothy.
sentences.cn: 将材料放入挤花袋内用7号喷嘴挤到4个16公分直径的塔圈内.

sentences.en: There are many kinds of glory. He upended the butt for another frothy mouthful.
sentences.cn: 荣耀有很多种. 他把另一口冒着泡的酒倒进嘴里.

sentences.en: Touch wood ! She pauses to sip a frothy iced coffee from a plastic tumbler.
sentences.cn: 她停下来 呷 了一口塑料杯里浮满泡沫的冰镇咖啡.

sentences.en: When the river's gradient becomes sharp, frothy water is formed consisting of bubbles and aerated water.
sentences.cn: 当河流坡度十分陡时, 常有水泡和汽水组成的泡沫流.

sentences.en: Yet the real importance of the proposed property tax goes far beyond controlling frothy housing prices.
sentences.cn: 不过,拟议房产税的实际重要性远不止于控制泡沫横生的房价.

words.tran_cn: 使起泡沫；以泡沫覆盖；发泄（froth的ing形式）
多泡的；起泡的；空洞的，浅薄的

trans.tran_en: a liquid that is frothy has lots of small  bubbles  on top
